column4: Has anyone heard of ubuntu kernel (from the 10.10 installer) causing a blade to segfault?  I do an install to a hard drive on my RLX blade, and it won't boot completely.  I have no console, so can't see the messages.  I am in a reboot loop, the last thing I see is the final RLX bios screen, then then the next thing I see is the RLX bios memory counter.
I"m not sure what a blade is maybe the kernel is the wrong archatechture?

yeah, that's what I thought.  uname -a on another one shows me that I have an i686 architechture installed.  But to be sure, I am downloading the 386 server iso right now.  These have transmeta CPUs on them.
it might need the arm build
